outputs.output_descr: This project aims to reduce the consumption of Chlorofluorocarbons (CFC) in Nigeria from 3 metric tonnes   in   2003 to (zero).  The project will also conserve the existing stock of Chlorofluorocarbons (CFC) in the country through the promotion of good practices in refrigeration and air-conditioning while conserving the existing stock of Chlorofluorocarbons (CFC) in the country through recovery and recycling of substances. This project will help Nigeria in meeting its Montreal Protocol obligations, such as the phased reductions in ODS consumption as per the agreed schedules.
outputs.output_title: Phase Out Plan For CFCs in Nig

project_descr: Project aims to reduce the consumption of CFCs in Nigeria to Zero. Using the promotion of good practices in refrigeration and air-conditioning system with recovery and recycling of substances the existing stock of CFCs in the country would be conserved.
project_title: Phase-Out Plan For Elimination Of CFCs in Nigeria
